guides.name: Adam
guides.bio: Adam is an Idaho native. He has grown up around these rivers and knows them backwards and forwards. He is the leader of our five-day trips, and is and excellent leader in a crisis. He is most at home in nature; the woods are his lifeline, and the river his pulse. He is a family man with five kids, and all of them love to hike, fish, and ride the rapids.

guides.name: Jacob
guides.bio: Jacob grew up in Boise, where he went to school at Boise State. After getting a degree in marketing, he changed course and found his passion in rafting. He has been an avid kayaker and rafter, and even competes in rafting competitions. He loves the thrill and challenge of the water and revels in the feel of the spray on his cheeks.

guides.name: Anna
guides.bio: Anna grew up in Colorado where she first learned she loved the water, riding the rapids of Arkansas River. She and her family moved to Idaho five-years ago, and the Salmon River is her new home. She loves all things outdoors: hunting, fishing, hiking, and camping. She takes on any challenge head-on, and is one of our best instructors and guides.
